verses.verse: <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H8064>"Heaven<s%> is My <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is My <S%H1916>footstool.<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> <S%H2088>then<s%> is a <S%H1004>house<s%> you could <S%H1129>build<s%> for Me? And <S%H335>where<s%> is a <S%H4725>place<s%> that I may <S%H4496>rest<s%>?

"For My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things,<s%> Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> into <S%H1961>being,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "But to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> I will <S%H5027>look,<s%> To him <S%H6041>who<s%> is <S%H6041>humble<s%> and <S%H5223>contrite<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and <S%H2730>who<s%> <S%H2730>trembles<s%> at My <S%H1697>word.<s%>

"[But] he who <S%H7819>kills<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> is [like] one who <S%H5221>slays<s%> a <S%H376>man;<s%> He who <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> is [like] the one who <S%H6202>breaks<s%> a dog's <S%H6202>neck;<s%> He who <S%H5927>offers<s%> a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> [is like one who offers] swine's <S%H1818>blood;<s%> He who <S%H2142>burns<s%> <S%H3828>incense<s%> is [like] the one who <S%H1288>blesses<s%> an <S%H205>idol.<s%> As they have <S%H977>chosen<s%> their [own] <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in their <S%H8251>abominations,<s%>

<S%H1571>So<s%> I will <S%H977>choose<s%> their <S%H8586>punishments,<s%> And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on them <S%H4034>what<s%> they <S%H4034>dread.<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> I <S%H7121>called,<s%> but <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H6030>answered;<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> but they did not <S%H8085>listen.<s%> And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight,<s%> And <S%H977>chose<s%> that in <S%H834>which<s%> I did not <S%H2654>delight.<s%> "

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you <S%H2730>who<s%> <S%H2730>tremble<s%> at His <S%H1697>word:<s%> "Your <S%H251>brothers<s%> who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you, who <S%H5077>exclude<s%> you for My name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> Have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Let the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H3513>glorified,<s%> that we may <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H8057>joy.<s%>' But they will be <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame.<s%>

"A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7588>uproar<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who is <S%H9608>rendering<s%> <S%H1576>recompense<s%> to His <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

<S%H2962>"Before<s%> she <S%H9123>travailed,<s%> she <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth;<s%> <S%H2962>Before<s%> her <S%H2256>pain<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> she <S%H4422>gave<s%> <S%H4422>birth<s%> to a <S%H2145>boy.<s%>

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H2088>thing<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> things? Can a <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H9123>born<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>? Can a <S%H1471>nation<s%> be <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H6471>all<s%> at <S%H259>once<s%> <S%H6471><s%>? As <S%H3588>soon<s%> as <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H9123>travailed,<s%> she <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> her <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

"Shall I <S%H7665>bring<s%> to the <S%H7665>point<s%> of <S%H7665>birth,<s%> and not <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>delivery<s%>?" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H518>"Or<s%> shall I who <S%H3205>gives<s%> <S%H3205>delivery<s%> <S%H6113>shut<s%> [the womb?]" <S%H559>says<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"Be <S%H8055>joyful<s%> with <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> for her, <S%H3605>all<s%> you who <S%H157>love<s%> her; Be <S%H4885>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7797>glad<s%> with her, <S%H3605>all<s%> you who <S%H56>mourn<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> her,

That you may <S%H3243>nurse<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with her <S%H8575>comforting<s%> <S%H9582>breasts,<s%> That you may <S%H4711>suck<s%> and be <S%H6026>delighted<s%> with her <S%H9103>bountiful<s%> <S%H9202>bosom.<s%> "

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H5186>extend<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to her like a <S%H5104>river,<s%> And the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> like an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream;<s%> And you shall be <S%H3243>nursed,<s%> you shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> on the <S%H6654>hip<s%> and <S%H8173>fondled<s%> on the <S%H1290>knees.<s%>
"As <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5162>comforts,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> I will <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you; And you shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"

Then you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> [this,] and your <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7797>glad,<s%> And your <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like the <S%H1877>new<s%> <S%H1877>grass;<s%> And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to His <S%H5650>servants,<s%> But He shall be <S%H2194>indignant<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> His <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H784>fire<s%> And His <S%H4818>chariots<s%> like the <S%H5492>whirlwind,<s%> To <S%H7725>render<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> with <S%H2534>fury,<s%> And His <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> with <S%H3851>flames<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H8199>execute<s%> <S%H8199>judgment<s%> by <S%H784>fire<s%> And by His <S%H2719>sword<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> And those <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be <S%H7231>many.<s%>

"Those who <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> and <S%H2891>purify<s%> themselves [to go] to the <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> <S%H310>Following<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> in the <S%H8432>center,<s%> Who <S%H398>eat<s%> swine's <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H8263>detestable<s%> <S%H8263>things,<s%> and <S%H5909>mice,<s%> Shall <S%H5486>come<s%> to an <S%H5486>end<s%> <S%H9191>altogether,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"For I know their <S%H4639>works<s%> and their <S%H4284>thoughts;<s%> the time is <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H3956>tongues.<s%> And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> My <S%H9202>glory.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> among them and will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H9453>survivors<s%> from them to the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H6316>Put,<s%> <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> <S%H7220>Rosh,<s%> <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> to the <S%H7350>distant<s%> <S%H339>coastlands<s%> that have <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> My <S%H8088>fame<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> My <S%H9202>glory.<s%> And they will <S%H5046>declare<s%> My <S%H9202>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"Then they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> as a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> in <S%H6632>litters,<s%> on <S%H6505>mules,<s%> and on <S%H3753>camels,<s%> to My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>"just<s%> as the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of them for <S%H3548>priests<s%> [and] for <S%H3881>Levites,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"For <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> I <S%H6213>make<s%> will <S%H5975>endure<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3651>"So<s%> your <S%H2233>offspring<s%> and your <S%H8034>name<s%> will <S%H5975>endure.<s%>

"And it shall be from <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> to <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> And from <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1320>mankind<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Then they shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H7200>look<s%> On the <S%H6297>corpses<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> Who have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against Me. For their <S%H9641>worm<s%> shall not <S%H4191>die,<s%> And their <S%H784>fire<s%> shall not be <S%H3518>quenched;<s%> And they shall be an <S%H1860>abhorrence<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>mankind.<s%>"
